name: library-manager
description: This project is a website that uses the SQL ORM Sequelize. The site will use a SQLite database to store all of the books.

scripts.seed-db: node_modules/.bin/sequelize db:migrate:undo:all && node_modules/.bin/sequelize db:migrate && node_modules/.bin/sequelize db:seed:undo:all && node_modules/.bin/sequelize db:seed:all

author: Moses Finlay
